evidence.claim: Principle Valuation LLC leverages HIPAA-compliant infrastructure for secure health information management.
The company utilizes cloud services for scalable data processing, though specific providers are not listed.
Principle Valuation offers solutions tailored for the health-tech industry but does not detail specific health standards like FHIR or HL7.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of EDI or X12 transactions found on the website.
